description.value: You can transform into a small animal or celestial creature to scurry and spy. You can Change Shape to assume a crawling form. While in crawling form, you gain the effect of a 1st-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pest Form], except you can transform only into a shape matching your heritage; for example, if you were once were a wolf, you turn into a wolf puppy.

value.value: born of animal or born of celestial heritage

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
